section.title: Log Levels
section.p: The possible logging levels are (in order of precedence): TRACE, DEBUG, INFO, WARN, and ERROR. This means that TRACE provides the most verbose logging while ERROR provides the least.
If a logger is not explicitly assigned a level, it inherits the level of its closest ancestor.
